de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.base

Interface SessionFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSessionFactory, DefaultClientSessionFactory, DefaultServerSessionFactory

    public interface SessionFactory
    Generic factory to create a session for a TNC(C/S).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Session createTnccsSession(TransportConnection connection)
      Creates a new session for a given connection.
